data.eml:eml: Taxonomic revision of the flathead fish genus Platycephalus Bloch, 1785 (Teleostei: Platycephalidae) from Australia, with description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Imamura, Hisashi (2015): Taxonomic revision of the flathead fish genus Platycephalus Bloch, 1785 (Teleostei: Platycephalidae) from Australia, with description of a new species. Zootaxa 3904 (2): 151-207, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3904.2.1
